title: About custom game.
body: why we can't do custom games from rotating gamemode?

replies.body: The main reason AFAIK is just due to the fact that we'd need to put a lot of time into coding that 'new' portion of the client (being able to setup custom games requires a decent bit of code, as well as a few server tweaks to allow those game modes). It's something I'm fairly sure we'll add it at some point, but I just don't have any hard details on that.
